DOC.brief_summary: To collect lipid-lowering response data use simvastatin 40 mg tablet patient hypercholesterolemia .
DOC.brief_title: To Evaluate Lipid-Lowering Efficacy Safety Simvastatin 40 Mg Tablet In Patients With Hypercholesterolemia ( 0733-264 )
DOC.criteria: Male female patient , > 18 year age Patients hypercholesterolemia meet follow lipid criterion : 1. primary cholesterolemia : total cholesterol > =240 mg/dl ldlc > = 160 mg/dl 2. secondary cholesterolemia ( patient cad , dm ) : ldlc > =130 mg/dl The patient willing follow NCEP therapeutic lifestyle change ( tlc ) similar cholesterollowering diet throughout duration study Congestive heart failure ( NYHA class III IV ) , uncontrolled cardiac arrhythmia , unstable angina pectoris Myocardial infarction , coronary artery bypass surgery , angioplasty within 3 month visit 1 Uncontrolled hypertension systolic blood pressure > 160 mmhg diastolic > 100 mmhg visit 1 . Unstable diabetes ( hba1c > 9 % ) newly diagnose ( within 3 month ) change antidiabetes medication within 3 month screen
